page.title: 06 Cubs and Brownies.
page.content: One of the things that we enjoy in Leomansley is going to Cubs and Brownies. The 6th Lichfield Cub pack meet at 6.30pm Monday nights. We do the Grand Howl at the begining and the end of the meeting. We have groups called sixes, which are named after colours. We play games, and do different badge work every month. We go on camps as well. Recently a group for younger boys has been started called Beavers. There are 45 Cubscouts. The Brownies also meet on Monday nights. We are called the 4th Lichfield pack. Our groups are also called sixes but we are called Kelpies Leprechauns, Gnomes and Pixies. Our leaders are Brown Owl, Barn Owl and Snowy Owl. We like playing games and working for our badges. There are 28 Brownies.
